item.title: Ph.D. Hooding Ceremony 2025 | May 9
item.description: When: Friday, May 9, 2025 Where: EMPAC - Concert Hall Check-in starts- at 7:45 AM ( coffee will be served) Ceremony- at 8:30 AM Refreshments- after the ceremony concludes. The hooding ceremony is a unique recognition of the achievement of each student who has earned a doctorate. Each doctoral candidate is introduced individually during the ceremony. They will have their hood placed on them while standing on the stage in the concert hall.
item.author: Students

item.title: James Fund Applications Now Open
item.description: Date: Wednesday, April 16, 2025 12:00 AM - Mon , April 28, 2025 12:00 AM - What: Join RPI’s student-managed investment fund to gain hands-on experience managing a six-figure portfolio, conducting investment research, and learning key finance concepts. Members benefit from a collaborative team environment and exclusive networking opportunities. Apply now! Who Should Apply: Students of any background interested in markets, finance, economics, or quantitative risk. Deadline: April 28th
item.author: Students

item.title: Reminder: 2025 Student Climate Survey Launched
item.description: The 2025 Student Climate Survey launched by email on March 31, 2025. Your honest opinions about campus life—how it impacts your ability to learn and grow, both academically and personally—are important. You will find your personal link to complete the survey in your email from President Schmidt. Our goal is to achieve at least a 50% response rate this year. Please submit the completely anonymous survey by April 25, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: EMPAC’s First Dance Festival is this week | April 17 - 18
item.description: April 17-18, 2025 — Join us for EMPAC’s inaugural dance festival EPHEMERAL ORGAN, where movement becomes memory. Over two evenings, the artists will transform EMPAC’s spaces into living archives—chambers where dance, installation, and conversation unfold. RPI Community tickets: $5

item.title: SaaS in the Age of Generative AI – Navigating the Boom (Virtual) | April 22
item.description: Date: Tuesday, April 22, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - In this webinar, Sarabeth Jaffe ’15 a Forbes 30 Under 30 entrepreneur and Shark Tank-backed founder shares her journey from software engineer to startup founder, offering insights into launching a startup in 2025, future-proofing SaaS products, and navigating the AI rat race without burning out.

item.title: Commencement and Ph.D. Hooding Registration
item.description: Attention, graduates! Registration is open for this year’s Commencement ceremony and Ph.D. Hooding ceremony. Keep an eye on your inbox for an email from Tassel with registration instructions, and be sure to complete your registration by Monday, April 21. If you’re participating in both Commencement and the Ph.D. Hooding, you’ll receive one registration email for both events. Haven’t received your email? Contact commencement@rpi.edu for assistance.

item.title: The Arts Department Invites you to the Creative Seminar II Spring Capstone Exhibition | April 19
